DRUID.name: Beast
advices: Take board control early on
Drag it to late game
Watch out for Savage Roar and keep charge minions in mind
Kill his beasts if you don't want him to draw

DRUID.name: Marvel
advices: Kill his Gadgetzan Auctioneer asap
Watch out for greedy plays and punish them
Keep removals for Violet Teacher

DRUID.name: C'Thun
advices: Try not to reach late game
Be wary of Brann and Fandral combos

DRUID.name: Midrange/Ramp
advices: Try not to reach late game
Keep removals for his big threats, not his taunts

HUNTER.name: Midrange
advices: Keep removals for Savannah Highmane
Keep AOEs for Call of the Wild

HUNTER.name: Midrange++
advices: Keep removals for Savannah Highmane and his 1 or 2 big legendaries
Keep AOEs for Call of the Wild

HUNTER.name: Aggro
advices: Protect your health points at all cost
Heal
Taunt
Watch out for beasts + Kill Command

HUNTER.name: Control
advices: Before deciding to hit face, remember that he plays Reno
He lacks early control, take advantage

HUNTER.name: Yogg N Load
advices: He has a lot of removals
He doesn't have many minions
Watch out for Yogg-Saron's randomness

MAGE.name: Tempo
advices: His goal is to take control of the board
Destroy Antonidas asap
Be ready for suprising spells out of Cabalist's tome

MAGE.name: Tempo Yogg-Saron
advices: Handle his Flamewakers quickly
Destroy Antonidas asap
Watch out for Yogg-Saron's randomness

MAGE.name: Freeze
advices: Don't let his Thaurissan alive
Keep your heals for after Alexstrasza
Watch out for Frost Nova + Doomsayer

PALADIN.name: Murloc aggro
advices: Focus his Murloc Warleaders and Tidecallers
Stay out of Leeroy's reach

PALADIN.name: Aggro
advices: Don't leave creatures on his board so he can't buff them

PALADIN.name: Secret N'Zoth
advices: Watch out for Wild Pyromancer + Equality
Keep big AOEs for N'Zoth

PALADIN.name: Dragon N'Zoth
advices: Keep big AOEs for N'Zoth
Watch out for Wild Pyromancer + Equality
Don't leave Ysera too long on the board
Try to kill him during early or mid game

PALADIN.name: Murloc
advices: Try to get rid of Murloc Warleaders without killing them
Remember he has lots of heals
Keep count of his dead murlocs

PRIEST.name: N'Zoth dragon
advices: Keep big AOEs for N'zoth
Try to kill him in early or mid game

PRIEST.name: Dragon
advices: His real true threats are Nefarian and Ysera
Has lots of removals

PRIEST.name: C'thun
advices: He might get his C'Thun back with Doomcaller
Try to win before late game or prepare yourself to survive C'Thun

PRIEST.name: Shadowform Reno
advices: He needs to draw his 2 Shadowforms before using Reno
Once he played Shadowform, his healing potential decreases
His biggest threat are Confessor Paletress and Kodorider

ROGUE.name: Tempo N'Zoth
advices: He has no heal, pressure him into using his removals
Keep AOEs for N'Zoth

ROGUE.name: Malygos
advices: Destroy Malygos and Gadgetzan Auctioneer asap
Try not to leave his Thaurissan on board for too long
Keep your health points high, he can easily deal 20 to 30 damage with Malygos

ROGUE.name: Miracle
advices: Destroy Gadgetzan Auctioneer asap
Keep your health points above 15
Kill him early or endure his combo

SHAMAN.name: Evolve
advices: Keep his board clear

SHAMAN.name: Midrange
advices: Survive until late game
Don't leave too many creatures on his board for Bloodlust

SHAMAN.name: Aggro
advices: Try to heal and play taunts
Destroy his spellpower totems
Destroy his doomhammers
Try dragging it to late game and overpowering him on board

SHAMAN.name: Totem
advices: Kill his Thunder Bluff Vailants quickly
Survive until late game

WARLOCK.name: Renolock
advices: Make him use Reno quickly
Watch out for early Mountain Giant
Don't go all-in before he plays Reno, or do it before turn 5

WARLOCK.name: Handlock
advices: Watch out for early Mountain Giants
Don't give him Molten giants for too cheap

WARLOCK.name: Zoo
advices: His goal is to take board advantage
Watch out for Darkshire Councilman + Forbidden ritual
Keep the Sea Giants in mind

WARRIOR.name: Dragon
advices: Try to protect your face
Be wary of Mortal strike

WARRIOR.name: Grim Patron
advices: Focus on eleminating his 2 Grim Patrons
Watch out, lots of 1 damage AOEs
Stay out of Grommash's reach

WARRIOR.name: OTK
advices: Kill him before he plays his combo

WARRIOR.name: Pirate aggro
advices: Don't leave pirates on board
Keep weapon removal for Arcanite Reaper

WARRIOR.name: Control
advices: Kill him early
Your chances of victory decrease with each turn
